00022 class Color {
00023     public:
00024         Color() { r() = g() = b() = a() = 0.; }
00025         Color(float, float, float, float = 0.);
00026 
00027         float &r() { return RGBA[0]; }  
00028         float &g() { return RGBA[1]; }  
00029         float &b() { return RGBA[2]; }  
00030         float &a() { return RGBA[3]; }  
00031 
00033         operator float *() { return RGBA; }
00034         Color operator *=(float);
00035         Color operator *(float);
00036         Color operator +=(float);
00037         Color operator +(float);
00038         void setComponentLowerLimit(float);
00039         void setComponentUpperLimit(float);
00040 
00041     private:
00042         float RGBA[4];  
00043 };
00044 
00050 inline Color::Color(float _r, float _g, float _b, float _a) {
00051     r() = _r;
00052     g() = _g;
00053     b() = _b;
00054     a() = _a;
00055 }
00056 
00059 inline Color Color::operator *=(float x) {
00060     for (unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00061         RGBA[i] *= x;
00062         if (RGBA[i] > 1.) RGBA[i] = 1.;
00063         if (RGBA[i] < 0.) RGBA[i] = 0.;
00064     }
00065     return *this;
00066 }
00067 
00070 inline Color Color::operator *(float x) {
00071     Color tmp(*this);
00072     return (tmp *= x);
00073 }
00074 
00077 inline Color Color::operator +=(float x) {
00078     for (unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00079         RGBA[i] += x;
00080         if (RGBA[i] > 1.) RGBA[i] = 1.;
00081         if (RGBA[i] < 0.) RGBA[i] = 0.;
00082     }
00083     return *this;
00084 }
00085 
00088 inline Color Color::operator +(float x) {
00089     Color tmp(*this);
00090     return (tmp += x);
00091 }
00092 
00095 inline void Color::setComponentLowerLimit(float l) {
00096     for (unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++) if (RGBA[i] < l) RGBA[i] = l;
00097 }
00098 
00101 inline void Color::setComponentUpperLimit(float u) {
00102     for (unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++) if (RGBA[i] > u) RGBA[i] = u;
00103 }
